# AccessibilityQuickActionPromptStyle

**Structure**

A presentation style that displays a prompt to the user when the accessibility quick action is active.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AccessibilityQuickActionPromptStyle
```

## Overview

Don’t use this type directly. Instead, use [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/AccessibilityQuickActionStyle/prompt].

## Supporting types

- **AccessibilityQuickActionOutlineStyle**: A presentation style that displays a prompt to the user when the accessibility quick action is active.

## Conforms To

- AccessibilityQuickActionStyle
